p: The highest essential oil percentage was observed in (Pb) + U50% (0.67%) and the lowest essential oil was obtained from the control (0.31%). The (Pb) + U50% treatment was significantly different from the other treatments. The (Pb) + U50% treatment and the (NPKb) + U50% treatment increased the essential oil percentage by 117.02 and 106.98%, respectively (Fig. 4b).
